chapters.title: Chapter 8: Whirlpools of Color
chapters.info: Getly (Get) Ayliah, p. 232 (271)—Young man from the Two Rivers who now travels with Perrin. He, Jondyn, and Hu followed those who fled Malden, a town the Shaido sacked, to find information from them about the Shaido army. He is a good tracker.
